name: Rage of Witches Halloween Tap Tap Special
name_original: Rage of Witches Halloween Tap Tap Special
description:
$0.99 => Free!
★FreeAppReport.com Featured App★

Protect the peasants! Tap like crazy! Fight off monsters, zombies, witches and ghosts!

----------------------------
REVIEWS
"This game offers hours of endless fun to users of almost any age" - nabercentral.com
"The graphics are decent and the action does get pretty frantic" - iphoneappreviews.net
----------------------------

Tap the evils to protect peasants. Fight against 9 different zombies, monsters, witches and ghosts! Get help from toad, knights, magicians and wise old men!

Warm up your fingers, get ready to tap like crazy! Similar to 'Hit The Mole' arcade game, Halloween special: Rage of Witches is easy to pick up and hard to put down!

Story Mode: familiarize with the game, tap your way through 10 stages!
Arcade Mode: Survive waves of ghosts and monsters!
Crazy Mode: All evils are coming at once, how long can you last?

Features:
Support iPhone/iPad
3 game modes
Cute and exciting graphics
Game Center
listen to iPod while in game!


note: works on iPhone 3gs and above
